title: BRIEF-China's Glodon Software to issue up to 1 bln yuan bonds
text:
BRIEF-China's Glodon Software to issue up to 1 bln yuan bonds Sept 29 
Sept 29 Glodon Software Co Ltd 
* Says plans to issue up to 1 billion yuan ($157.18 million) bonds 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1LYXIpO 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3621 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
